projects.name: Facebook Clone
projects.description: Facebook design webapp, where you can login with your gmail account, create posts and add images

projects.name: Amazon design Ecommerce app
projects.description: Amazon design webapp with admin user who can create update or delete products. Paypal payment implemented. Profile page where you can see your orders and update your information and many more

projects.name: Rest api and React app
projects.description: REST API that lets users create, list, update, and delete items from database. And allow users to view a list of courses and the detail for a specific course, sign up to create an account or sign in with an existing account, and create, update, or delete courses.

projects.name: React Gallery App
projects.description: This app allows you to view a gallery of flickr images by entering a keyword in the search box, or by selecting one of the default navlinks.

projects.name: Public API Requests
projects.description: Program that create an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API

projects.name: Interactive Form
projects.description: Adding customized and conditional behavior and interactivity, validating user input and providing helpful error messages when the user enters invalid information into the form fields

projects.name: List Pagination and Filtering
projects.description: Program that divide a long list into a series of pages and improve the user experience of a web page
